content:
TASK: Craft an item of type: golden_hoe
inventory=[{"type": "firework_star", "quantity": 12, "index": 10}, {"type": "stone", "quantity": 24, "index": 14}, {"type": "jungle_fence_gate", "quantity": 26, "index": 17}, {"type": "heart_of_the_sea", "quantity": 20, "index": 21}, {"type": "dragon_head", "quantity": 36, "index": 25}, {"type": "stick", "quantity": 2, "index": 26}, {"type": "arrow", "quantity": 63, "index": 27}, {"type": "brown_shulker_box", "quantity": 1, "index": 32}, {"type": "gold_block", "quantity": 1, "index": 33}, {"type": "quartz_slab", "quantity": 24, "index": 41}]

thought: I need to craft a golden_hoe, which requires gold_ingot and a stick. I already have a stick in the inventory at slot 26, but I do not have gold_ingot. Therefore, I will craft the gold_ingot first. To craft gold_ingot, I can smelt the gold_block at slot 33.
Ok
act: move from slot 33 to slot 1 with quantity 1

TASK: Craft an item of type: golden_hoe
inventory=[{"type": "gold_ingot", "quantity": 9, "index": 0}, {"type": "gold_block", "quantity": 1, "index": 1}, {"type": "firework_star", "quantity": 12, "index": 10}, {"type": "stone", "quantity": 24, "index": 14}, {"type": "jungle_fence_gate", "quantity": 26, "index": 17}, {"type": "heart_of_the_sea", "quantity": 20, "index": 21}, {"type": "dragon_head", "quantity": 36, "index": 25}, {"type": "stick", "quantity": 2, "index": 26}, {"type": "arrow", "quantity": 63, "index": 27}, {"type": "brown_shulker_box", "quantity": 1, "index": 32}, {"type": "quartz_slab", "quantity": 24, "index": 41}]
thought: I can now craft the golden_hoe by moving the gold_ingot and stick to the crafting grid. I will first move the gold_ingot to slot 11, since that is the first free slot in the crafting grid.
Ok
act: move from slot 0 to slot 11 with quantity 9

TASK: Craft an item of type: golden_hoe
